channel.title: Can somone give me an example of a case for a mining rock?
channel.description: Alright. Can somone please give me an example of a case for a mining rock because i am adding a mining spot and i would realy want the rocks to work please thanks =]

item.title: Can somone give me an example of a case for a mining rock?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("You Gain Some Mining, and get some Cash!!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

That is for elemental ore, even though it is a very sloppy code. You can edit it from there.
